letters.description: Identify and acknowledge the presence of inner child wounds and their associated emotions and behaviors.
Explore the roots of the inner child's pain by understanding the childhood experiences that shaped their beliefs and feelings.
Provide the inner child with the nurturing, validation, and protection they lacked in childhood, offering corrective emotional experiences.
Cultivate self-compassion and develop soothing techniques to comfort the inner child during moments of distress and emotional activation.
Empower the inner child to integrate past experiences, build resilience, and evolve towards a more secure and authentic self.
